suite.name: Login Tests

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.name: Login Screen Should Display Logo

kw.name: Setup Test With Clean State
Open Browser To QuickList
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.
Abre o navegador na aplicação QuickList

kw.name: Clear All Local Storage
Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
Limpa todo o localStorage

kw.name: Reload Page
kw.doc: Simulates user reloading page.
Configura teste com estado limpo (sem dados)

Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
